snippet: Jacoby Jones caught a touchdown pass and returned a kickoff an N.F.L. postseason-record 108 yards for another in his return to his native New Orleans.
abstract: Baltimore Ravens wide receiver Jacoby Jones caught one touchdown pass and returned a kickoff 108 yards for another, setting NFL postseason record, in providing the most explosive moments of Ravens Super Bowl victory.
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Jones caught a touchdown pass and returned a kickoff an N.F.L. postseason-record 108 yards for another in his return to his native New Orleans.

headline.seo: Super Bowl — For Jacoby Jones, Trip Home and 2 Trips Into End Zone
headline.main: For the Ravens’ Jones, a Trip Home and 2 Trips Into the End Zone
headline.print_headline: For the Ravens’ Jones, a Trip Home and 2 Trips Into the End Zone
